sentences.english: The resection of occipital condylar and jugular tuber can increase surgical freedom.
sentences.chinese: 枕髁和頸靜脈結節的磨除可增加手術視野。

sentences.english: The performance of the human eye largely depends on the level of illuminance in the visual field.
sentences.chinese: 在視野中人類的眼睛表現大量地仰賴照明度的水平。

sentences.english: But before she could even finish, Ole vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 可是她甚至話都沒能說完，奧立就從視野裏消失了。

sentences.english: Increased the angle you can turn the cockpit camera in the rear hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 增加了坐艙視野在後半球的開闊角度。

sentences.english: A long-term view reinforces the impact of market orientation on output indicators (mainly business performance and esprit de corps as conceptualized by Kohli and Jaworski, 1990).
sentences.chinese: 長期的視野加強市場定方位對輸出指示器的衝擊。
閱讀能開闊我們的視野。

sentences.english: Finally, an arrow indicator is added to accurately simulate a microscope's FOV.
sentences.chinese: 最後，添加一個箭頭指標，以準確模擬顯微鏡的視野。

sentences.english: Part-time and summer jobs can broaden horizon.
sentences.chinese: 兼職及暑期工能擴闊視野。

sentences.english: Shift not yourself in the sight of others, nor gnaw your nails.
sentences.chinese: 不要在別人的視野裏晃來晃去，也不要啃手指甲。

sentences.english: Conclusion Syntropy hemiopia is the most common type of change of field of vision affecting lesions in posterior visual pathways;
sentences.chinese: 結論同向性偏盲是後視路疾病最常見的視野改變類型。

sentences.english: The House of Diffusion foregoes an interior courtyard in favor of carefully censored views of its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 擴散住宅放棄內部庭院有利於觀看外部的視野。

sentences.english: Kaiping Diaolou and villages have stepped into the cultural vision of the world.
sentences.chinese: 開平碉樓與村落，已經走進了全人類的文化視野。

sentences.english: Full-height glazing on this level provides views over the perimeter wall to the lake beyond.
sentences.chinese: 上層的全玻璃幕牆提供了到湖邊的視野。

sentences.english: Broken rocks above the field of colour.
A typcial binocular field spans 5 to 6 degrees of sky.
sentences.chinese: 一般雙筒望遠鏡視野範圍在天空中大約5度和6度。

sentences.english: The Yoropen changes all of that providing a unique field of vision.
sentences.chinese: 優樂筆改變了那些部分，提供一個獨特的視野。

definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
